input.sentences: we had a great time at the saint patricks parade
even the sheriff posed for picture
output.sentences: Everyone is Irish and everyone loves a parade on St. Patrick's Day.
Leading the parade is the local drum and bugle corps.
Crowds line the streets of even the smallest city.Little
Little one sit on grown up' shoulders so they too can see.
With all the marchers gone onlookers stream home still excited from what they've what they've shared.
